subject: Basketball
Protective Clothing
Teeth and Dentistry
Mouth
lead_paragraph: Once the standard of football players, the innocuous piece of equipment has taken the N.B.A. by storm, and the benefits of wearing one may go beyond simply shielding one’s teeth.
